g.title: cancelled->cancelled
g.text: RefreshStatus - Log collection timeout during cancelled

g.title: error->error
g.text: RefreshStatus - Log collection timeout during error

g.title: finalizing->error
g.text: RefreshStatus - Finalizing stage timed out. Move to error

g.title: finalizing->finalizing
g.text: RefreshStatus - Finalizing stage is taking too long. Emit an appropriate event

g.title: installing-pending-user-action->error
g.text: RefreshStatus - Timed out while waiting for user

g.title: insufficient->insufficient
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh discovering cluster - detect insufficient

g.title: insufficient->pending-for-input
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh discovering cluster - detect required input

g.title: insufficient->ready
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh discovering cluster - detect ready

g.title: pending-for-input->insufficient
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh discovering cluster - detect insufficient

g.title: pending-for-input->pending-for-input
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh discovering cluster - detect required input

g.title: pending-for-input->ready
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh discovering cluster - detect ready

g.title: ready->insufficient
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh discovering cluster - detect insufficient

g.title: ready->pending-for-input
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh discovering cluster - detect required input

g.title: ready->ready
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh discovering cluster - detect ready

g.title: preparing-for-installation->installing
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh preparing cluster - done preparing

g.title: preparing-for-installation->ready
g.text: RefreshStatus - Refresh preparing cluster - detect timeout
